Articles.Content:
Mornin\' all, just me here starting a name for myself Ive been playing KSP for a while now, but ive finally decided to make a presence for myself on the forums. I havent really got anything to say in this, so ill just leave it as this:

If anyone feels like having an apprentice for KSP and what not, i\'m your man!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Please excuse the bronies, they may be annoying, but they are harmless.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Please excuse the bronies, they may be annoying, but they are harmless.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Is there a problem with bronies?

Is there a problem with bronies?

Was it not clear in what I wrote? I don\'t have a problem with them until they become annoying, like posting an image as a post.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
Already civil war amongst the ranks? i almost feel redundant

Is there a problem with bronies?

Yeah, some of them are a little obnoxious with what they post.

Try to keep the images down, ok?

KSPF can\'t handle the pure awesome energy of Pinkie on a regular basis

OK, i have never heard of this \'bronies\' cult. Just a group of people who like ponies and post pictures a lot? and why is that a problem? (baring in mind im not taking either side, i literaaly havent got a clue what you guys are really on about XD)

OK, i have never heard of this \'bronies\' cult. Just a group of people who like ponies and post pictures a lot? and why is that a problem? (baring in mind im not taking either side, i literaaly havent got a clue what you guys are really on about XD)

Its people (males between the ages of 11 and 40) that like the tv series My Little Pony or MLP. They are completly harmless and only sometimes annoying (some of them post alot of pictures, which annoys people who don\'t like the program).

You won\'t even notice we\'re here.

Anyways, welcome to the forums!

Rawr,

Capt\'n Pants

Please excuse the bronies, they may be annoying, but they are harmless.

...

We think.
I\'m surprised people don\'t think this is a pony-exclusive forum, by now...
UGH. There\'s nothing wrong with ponies. Pony Discussion Over.
What i nice environment for a newbie to set up in XD i\'m glad i came
